title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The stout veteran received the threat with scorn,declaring that if Valleyfield were injured, the English vessels of war in the Frith should in revengereceive instructions to burn down Wemyss castle,which is built on a rock overhanging the sea.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: But to intimidate General Preston, the Chevalier caused him to be informed, that if he fired on the city of Edinburgh,he would, in retaliation, cause the General's houseat Valleyfield in Fife, to be burnt to the ground.

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
snippet: 6 Valleyfield in the parish of Culross.
